name: route-graphics
description: A 2D graphics rendering interface that takes JSON input and renders pixels using PixiJS

scripts.vt:generate: bun run build && docker run --rm --user $(id -u):$(id -g) -e RTGL_VT_DEBUG=true -v "$PWD:/workspace" han4wluc/rtgl:playwright-v1.57.0-rtgl-v1.0.0-rc11 rtgl vt generate --wait-event vt:ready
scripts.vt:screenshot: bun run build && docker run --rm --user $(id -u):$(id -g) -e RTGL_VT_DEBUG=true -v "$PWD:/workspace" han4wluc/rtgl:playwright-v1.57.0-rtgl-v1.0.0-rc11 rtgl vt screenshot --wait-event vt:ready --concurrency 8
scripts.vt:report: bun run vt:screenshot && docker run --rm --user $(id -u):$(id -g) -e RTGL_VT_DEBUG=true -v "$PWD:/workspace" han4wluc/rtgl:playwright-v1.57.0-rtgl-v1.0.0-rc11 rtgl vt report
scripts.vt:accept: docker run --rm --user $(id -u):$(id -g) -e RTGL_VT_DEBUG=true -v "$PWD:/workspace" han4wluc/rtgl:playwright-v1.57.0-rtgl-v1.0.0-rc11 rtgl vt accept
